description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the kernel streaming wow thunk service driver elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-38144):

1. Download and apply the appropriate update packages for your system from the official Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. Restart your system after installing the updates to apply the changes.

**Details**:
- This update addresses an integer overflow or wraparound vulnerability allowing potential elevation of privilege.
- Ensure to install the correct update package based on your Windows version:
  - Windows 11 Version 24H2: [KB5041571](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041571)
  - Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5041585](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041585)
  - Windows 11 Version 22H2: [KB5041585](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041585)
  - Windows 10 Version 22H2: [KB5041580](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041580)
  - Windows 10 Version 21H2: [KB5041592](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041592)

**Preconditions**:
- Confirm your Windows build version before applying updates.
- Backup critical data prior to performing system updates.
